tag_list: mobile, mobile-exchange, pbx, aastra, cisco, opticaller-software, mobisma, mobility, economics, telephony, ip-telephony
overview:
Teodor Trygg is a Key Account Manager caring for the sales operations at OptiCaller Software, signing distributors, manufacturers, resellers and such. OptiCaller Software is a company developing software to enable a better way to stay mobile in work. Together with a OptiCaller, a company PBX (Company exchange) can become a mobile exchange. You will be able to use the exchange via your mobile phone through a graphical interface and a seemless dialer making advanced calls as easy as a regular call.

OptiCaller Software also focuses on LCR (Least Cost Routing) which consists of two different call-setups; Call-Through and Call-Back. With new technology and our software, you can cut your costs with up to 95%.
